title: IIT Roorkee Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Junior Research Fellow Post
description: Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee (IIT Roorkee) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech. in Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Roorkee Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can send the...
